version of securityToken will be generated\r","_ticker":"is the ticker symbol of the security token\r","_tokenDetails":"is the off-chain details of the token\r","_treasuryWallet":"Ethereum address which will holds the STs.\r"}},"generateSecurityToken(string,string,string,bool)":{"details":"this function is for backwards compatibilty with 2.0 dApp.\r","params":{"_divisible":"is whether or not token\r"}},"modifyExistingTicker(address,string,uint256,uint256,bool)":{"params":{"_expiryDate":"is the expiry date for the ticker\r","_owner":"is the owner of the token\r","_registrationDate":"is the Only Polymath.\r"},"constructor":"//////////////////////////","generateNewSecurityToken(string,string,string,bool,address,uint256)":{"notice":"Deploys an instance of a new Security Token and records it to the registry\r"},"generateSecurityToken(string,string,string,bool)":{"notice":"Deploys an instance of a new Security Token of version 2.0 and records it to the registry\r"},"getArrayAddress(bytes32)":{"notice":"getArrayBytes32(keccak256(abi.encodePacked(\"tokensOwnedByOwner\", 0x1)).length;"},"getFees(bytes32)":{"notice":"Returns the usd & poly fee for a particular feetype\r"},"getSecurityTokenLaunchFee()":{"notice":"Gets the security token launch fee\r"},"getTickerRegistrationFee()":{"notice":"Gets the ticker registration fee\r"},"getUintValue(bytes32)":{"notice":"string _name = getString(keccak256(abi.encodePacked(\"registeredSymbols_name\", \"TOKEN\"));"},"initialize(address,uint256,uint256,address,address)":{"notice":"Initializes instance of STR\r"},"isPaused()":{"notice":"Check whether the registry is paused or not\r"},"isSecurityToken(address)":{"notice":"Checks that Security Token is registered\r"},"modifyExistingSecurityToken(string,address,address,string,uint256)":{"notice":"Adds a new custom Security Token and saves it to the registry. (Token should follow the ISecurityToken interface)\r"},"modifyExistingTicker(address,string,uint256,uint256,bool)":{"notice":"Modifies the ticker details. Only Polymath has the ability to do so.\rOnly allowed to modify the tickers which are not yet deployed.\r"},"owner()":{"notice":"Gets the owner of the contract\r"},"pause()":{"notice":"Called by the owner to pause, triggers stopped state\r"},"reclaimERC20(address)":{"notice":"Reclaims all ERC20Basic compatible tokens\r"},"refreshSecurityToken(string,string,string,bool,address)":{"notice":"Deploys an instance of a new Security Token and replaces the old one in the registry\r This can be used to upgrade from version 2.0 of ST to 3.0 or in case something goes wrong with earlier ST\r"},"registerNewTicker(address,string)":{"notice":"Registers the token ticker to the selected owner\rOnce the token ticker is registered to its owner then no other issuer can claim\rits ownership. If the ticker expires and its issuer hasn't used it, then someone else can take it.\r"},"removeProtocolFactory(uint8,uint8,uint8)":{"notice":"Removes a STFactory\r"},"removeTicker(string)":{"notice":"Removes the ticker details, associated ownership & security token mapping\r"},"setGetterRegistry(address)":{"notice":"Set the getter contract address\r"},"setLatestVersion(uint8,uint8,uint8)":{"notice":"Changes the default protocol version\rUsed only by Polymath to upgrade the SecurityToken contract and add more functionalities to future versions\rChanging versions does not affect existing tokens.\r"},"setProtocolFactory(address,uint8,uint8,uint8)":{"notice":"Changes the SecurityToken contract for a particular factory version\rUsed only by Polymath to upgrade the SecurityToken contract and add more functionalities to future versions\rChanging versions does not affect existing tokens.\r"},"tickerAvailable(string)":{"notice":"Checks if the entered ticker is registered and has not expired\r"},"transferTickerOwnership(address,string)":{"notice":"Transfers the ownership of the ticker\r"},"unpause()":{"notice":"Called by the owner to unpause, returns to normal state\r"},"updateFromRegistry()":{"notice":"Used to update the polyToken contract address\r"},"updatePolyTokenAddress(address)":{"notice":"Changes the PolyToken address. params._newExpiry: is the new expiry for newly generated tickers

params._isFeeInPoly: defines if the fee is in poly or usd
params._stLaunchFee: is the st generation fee (base 18 decimals)
params._tickerRegFee: is the ticker registration fee (base 18 decimals)

params._stLaunchFee: is the registration fee in USD tokens (base 18 decimals)

params._tickerRegFee: is the registration fee in USD tokens (base 18 decimals)

params._divisible: is whether or not the token is divisible
params._name: is the name of the token
params._protocolVersion: Version of securityToken contract - `_protocolVersion` is the packed value of uin8[3] array (it will be calculated offchain) - if _protocolVersion == 0 then latest version of securityToken will be generated
params._ticker: is the ticker symbol of the security token
params._tokenDetails: is the off-chain details of the token
params._treasuryWallet: Ethereum address which will holds the STs.

generateSecurityToken(string,string,stri.details: this function is for backwards compatibilty with 2.0 dApp.

params._divisible: is whether or not the token is divisible
params._name: is the name of the token
params._ticker: is the ticker symbol of the security token
params._tokenDetails: is the off-chain details of the token

params._getterContract: Contract address of the contract which consists getter functions.
params._owner: is the owner of the STR,
params._polymathRegistry: is the address of the Polymath Registry
params._stLaunchFee: is the fee in USD required to launch a token
params._tickerRegFee: is the fee in USD required to register a ticker

params._securityToken: is the address of the security token

params._deployedAt: is the timestamp at which the security token is deployed
params._owner: is the owner of the token
params._securityToken: is the address of the securityToken
params._ticker: is the ticker symbol of the security token
params._tokenDetails: is the off-chain details of the token

params._expiryDate: is the expiry date for the ticker
params._owner: is the owner of the token
params._registrationDate: is the date at which ticker is registered

modifySecurityToken(string,string,addres.details: This function is just for backwards compatibility

modifyTicker(address,string,string,uint2.details: This function is just for backwards compatibility

params._tokenContract: is the address of the token contract

refreshSecurityToken(string,string,strin.details: This function needs to be in STR 3.0. Defined public to avoid stack overflow

params._divisible: is whether or not the token is divisible
params._name: is the name of the token
params._ticker: is the ticker symbol of the security token
params._tokenDetails: is the off-chain details of the token

params._owner: is address of the owner of the token

registerTicker(address,string,string).details: This function is just for backwards compatibility

params._STFactoryAddress: is the address of the proxy.

transferOwnership(address).details: Allows the current owner to transfer control of the contract to a newOwner.

params._newOwner: The address to transfer ownership to.
is the address of the new owner of the ticker

params._newAddress: is the address of the polytoken.

devdoc.title: Registry contract for issuers to register their tickers and security tokens

changeExpiryLimit(uint256).notice: Changes the expiry time for the token ticker. Only available to Polymath.

changeFeesAmountAndCurrency(uint256,uint.notice: Sets the ticker registration and ST launch fee amount and currency

changeSecurityLaunchFee(uint256).notice: Sets the ticker registration fee in USD tokens. Only Polymath.

changeTickerRegistrationFee(uint256).notice: Sets the ticker registration fee in USD tokens. Only Polymath.

generateNewSecurityToken(string,string,s.notice: Deploys an instance of a new Security Token and records it to the registry

generateSecurityToken(string,string,stri.notice: Deploys an instance of a new Security Token of version 2.0 and records it to the registry

getFees(bytes32).notice: Returns the usd & poly fee for a particular feetype

getSecurityTokenLaunchFee().notice: Gets the security token launch fee

isPaused().notice: Check whether the registry is paused or not

isSecurityToken(address).notice: Checks that Security Token is registered

modifyExistingSecurityToken(string,addre.notice: Adds a new custom Security Token and saves it to the registry. (Token should follow the ISecurityToken interface)

modifyExistingTicker(address,string,uint.notice: Modifies the ticker details. Only Polymath has the ability to do so.Only allowed to modify the tickers which are not yet deployed.

owner().notice: Gets the owner of the contract

pause().notice: Called by the owner to pause, triggers stopped state

refreshSecurityToken(string,string,strin.notice: Deploys an instance of a new Security Token and replaces the old one in the registry This can be used to upgrade from version 2.0 of ST to 3.0 or in case something goes wrong with earlier ST

registerNewTicker(address,string).notice: Registers the token ticker to the selected ownerOnce the token ticker is registered to its owner then no other issuer can claimits ownership. If the ticker expires and its issuer hasn't used it, then someone else can take it.

removeTicker(string).notice: Removes the ticker details, associated ownership & security token mapping

setLatestVersion(uint8,uint8,uint8).notice: Changes the default protocol versionUsed only by Polymath to upgrade the SecurityToken contract and add more functionalities to future versionsChanging versions does not affect existing tokens.

setProtocolFactory(address,uint8,uint8,u.notice: Changes the SecurityToken contract for a particular factory versionUsed only by Polymath to upgrade the SecurityToken contract and add more functionalities to future versionsChanging versions does not affect existing tokens.

tickerAvailable(string).notice: Checks if the entered ticker is registered and has not expired

transferTickerOwnership(address,string).notice: Transfers the ownership of the ticker

unpause().notice: Called by the owner to unpause, returns to normal state

updateFromRegistry().notice: Used to update the polyToken contract address

updatePolyTokenAddress(address).notice: Changes the PolyToken address. Only Polymath.
